long_description: a place to grow and achieve life goals. vanderhorst brothers, inc. is a team of highly skilled professionals from a variety of backgrounds. we work together to support our customers through expertise, cooperation, innovation, and a shared sense of urgency. we actively seek challenging projects, and we drive our industry forward by investing in the latest machinery, technology, and production techniques. we work every day toward a shared vision: to be recognized by machinists as a world-class employer, recgonized by customers as a world-class supplier, and recognized by partners as a world-class producer in the supply chain. as a company committed to continuous improvement, we maintain as9100 certification and train in lean manufacturing methodologies. a place for everything and everything in its place.
